entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
